description: The last day of the training camp is fast approaching, and Akihisa and Yuuji hatch one more plan to try and peek on the girls and find out who their blackmailer is. This sets the stage for an all-out showdown between the guys and the girls.

titles.title: Boku to Nozoki to Harukanaru Togenkyou!
Eu, Espionando E O Shangri-La Distante!
Me, Peeking, and Far Away Paradise!!
僕とのぞきと遥かなる桃源郷っ!
